title: Trump talks ICE, US-China relations in wide-ranging '60 Minutes' interview
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said immigration officials "haven't gone far enough" despite criticism, and that China won't attack Taiwan.

title: Trump says he will not attend Supreme Court tariff case arguments
shortDescription: Trump told reporters he wouldn't attend the Supreme Court arguments on the legality of his tariffs because he didn't want to interfere with the case.

title: Trump held 'Great Gatsby'-themed Halloween party on eve of SNAP cutoff
shortDescription: President Donald Trump held a "Roaring 20's" themed party as food aid for 42 million low-income Americans was set to expire.

title: Trump threatens military action in Nigeria
shortDescription: President Trump instructed "our Department of War to prepare for possible action" against the Nigerian government over "the killing of Christians."

title: Trump's disapproval rises in new poll, but Americans call Dems 'out of touch'
shortDescription: In a new Washington Post/ABC News/Ipsos poll, Trump's disapproval rating jumped to a level not seen since its January 2021 survey.

title: 7 big questions hanging over Election Day 2025
shortDescription: Off-year races in Virginia, New Jersey, California and beyond are seen as key early barometers of how voters are feeling about Trump and Democrats.

title: Meet the hardworking Americans taking on Trump's tariffs at the Supreme Court
shortDescription: President Trump argues his sweeping tariffs will bring jobs back to the United States. The businesses challenging the tariffs say they're doing more harm than good.

title: What time do polls open on Election Day? Check your state info.
shortDescription: Americans across the country head to polls on Tuesday, Nov. 4. Find out what time in your state.

title: Trump threatens Nigerian government over the 'killing of Christians'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened the Nigerian government over the "killing of Christians' in a Truth Social post on Saturday, Nov. 1.

title: Zohran Mamdani talks to USA TODAY about young voters
shortDescription: Early voting has appeared to skew towards older voters and Andrew Cuomo has gained in the NYC mayoral polls, making youth turnout key for Mamdani.

title: Survivors of US boat attacks raise new concerns in Congress
shortDescription: Two survivors of the Pentagon's boat attacks were returned to their home countries, raising new concerns about whether such strikes are legal.

title: Will Trumpâ€™s tariffs fail at the Supreme Court?
shortDescription: Reporter Maureen Groppe explains the significance of the tariffs case being heard at the Supreme Court that could define Trump's presidency.

title: Canadian PM Carney says he apologized to Trump over tariff ad
shortDescription: The ad, run by a provincial government, angered President Donald Trump and prompted him to halt trade talks with Canada.

title: Democratic White House hopefuls are using 2025 as practice for 2028
shortDescription: Democratic leaders like Pete Buttigieg, Andy Beshear and JB Pritzker are filling a void in New Jersey and Virginia with Biden and Harris off the trail.

title: California set to have a big say on Trump's final two years in office
shortDescription: California's Proposition 50 will help determine if Democrats or Republicans win the US House in 2026 and who hold power during Trump's last two years.

title: Are Trump's tariffs too big to fail at the Supreme Court?
shortDescription: The stakes are huge for the challenge to President Trump's sweeping tariffs that the Supreme Court will consider on Nov. 5.

title: Trump gives White House Lincoln Bathroom a gold and marble facelift
shortDescription: Trump, who has had a long career in real estate has been putting his design stamp on all manner of things at the White House.

title: Judge blocks Trump order requiring voters to prove citizenship
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Colleen Kollar-Kotelly in Washington, D.C., was the first to reach a final ruling against the Trump executive order.
